creator: david.hay@ecosse.net
text:
Using JspC to pre-compile my jsp pages using Ant.  However, if I run it 
repeatedly, without changing any of the jsp files, all the files are pre-
compiled again.

I believe JspC should act as javac and only re-pre-compile if the file has 
changed?

Many thanks,

David Hay

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
My guess is that the "out-of-date" checks done in Jasper compare the JSP
to the class file rather than the Java source, and are thus not part of the
JSP translation phase.  There isn't time to work on this for 3.3. Marking
as "later".  If you come up with a patch, attach it to this bug report and
reopen it to have it addressed.
I believe this is resolved, in the <jspc> task in ant, which is what should be used in future ( IMHO ).
